name: Astralsupial
description: The Astralsupial is a medium-sized beast characterized by its blend of speed and agility. Its apposable thumbs grant it extraordinary climbing capabilities, and its natural armor provides decent protection.
memorable: Its ability to pull various objects from an extradimensional pouch and the unique effects they can cause, from blinding to poisoning, makes it an interesting and unpredictable combatant.
goals: To explore its environment, engage in combat, and utilize its abilities to outmaneuver foes.
relations: It could encounter other beasts or creatures in its territory and may interact with adventurers seeking its unique abilities.
environment: Forests and areas with plenty of climbing opportunities and hiding spots.
strengths: High dexterity allows for effective dodging and nimble maneuvers; the Astral Pouch offers versatile tactical options.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and strength limit its combat tactics and physical capabilities.
attacks: It can make two claw attacks, dealing 10 slashing damage, and utilize its unique Astral Pouch ability to affect surroundings and creatures.
most_powerful_ability: The Astral Pouch allows the Astralsupial to create varying effects using different objects, affecting multiple creatures at once.
senses: Keen hearing and smell grant it an advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks related to these senses.
skills: It has average perception skills, making it somewhat aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: The Astralsupial can teleport up to 30 feet twice per day with its Astral Traveler ability.
When reduced to low health, it can feign death to surprise attackers.
Its claw attacks are reliable in close-range combat due to its good dexterity.
The creature is immune to the effects of its own Astral Pouch.
Requires strategic thinking from players to fully utilize its capabilities in combat.
